answers.text: There are limited commercial flights entering or leaving Yemen. The majority of land sea and air ports are closed until further notice.
There are limited commercial flights entering or leaving Yemen. The majority of land sea and air ports are closed until further notice.

paragraphs.context: UN Entry to Yemen: There are limited commercial flights entering or leaving Yemen. The majority of land sea and air ports are closed until further notice.  For Sana’a please refer to the UNHAS schedule, and staff should go for a mandatory 14 days self-isolation in the United Nations Common Accommodation Facility. Please note that there is a staff ceiling, quarantine requirements and a very limited accommodation that affect the UNHAS bookings to Sana’a.

qas.question: Do i have to self-isolate in yemen?

answers.text: the staff member who can provide a medical certificate with a negative coronavirus PCR test result issued at most 72 hours before departure, should consult UN clinic upon arrival to Aden and if approved by UN clinic the 14 days self-isolation will be exempted.

qas.question: If i am a national staff member, do i have to self-isolate in yemen?

answers.text: For national staff, they should go for a mandatory 14 days self-isolation at their own homes.

qas.question: Do i need a pcr test to enter yemen?

answers.text: the staff member who can provide a medical certificate with a negative coronavirus PCR test result issued at most 72 hours before departure, should consult UN clinic upon arrival to Aden and if approved by UN clinic the 14 days self-isolation will be exempted.

paragraphs.context: New update: the staff member who can provide a medical certificate with a negative coronavirus PCR test result issued at most 72 hours before departure, should consult UN clinic upon arrival to Aden and if approved by UN clinic the 14 days self-isolation will be exempted. Please note that there is a staff ceiling, quarantine requirements and a very limited accommodation that affect the UNHAS bookings to Aden. For national staff, they should go for a mandatory 14 days self-isolation at their own homes.

qas.question: What is travel like within yemen?

answers.text: Authorities across Yemen have introduced a range of measures. These include curfews, movement restrictions, closures of businesses and limitations on public and private gatherings. Implementation may vary and restrictions can change at short notice

paragraphs.context: Travel in Yemen: Authorities across Yemen have introduced a range of measures. These include curfews, movement restrictions, closures of businesses and limitations on public and private gatherings. Implementation may vary and restrictions can change at short notice. Some areas have designated quarantine camps. These can vary in both quality and access to medical provision.
